The configurations for encryption mode

  • Constructor Details

    • EncryptionConfiguration

      public EncryptionConfiguration(RSAPublicKey publicKey, byte[] userData, EncryptionMode encryptionMode)
      Constructor of Encryption configuration object. This is used to build the encrypted secure keypad
      Parameters:
      publicKey - The RSA public key to be used for keys encryption.
      userData - A custom user data to be encrypted with public key. It can't be null and maximum size depends on key size. See Programmer's Guide for details about maximum size.
      encryptionMode - The mode to use for encryption.
      Since:
      6.2

  • Method Details

    • getPublicKey

      public RSAPublicKey getPublicKey()
      Returns the RSA public key to be used for keys encryption.

    • getUserData

      public byte[] getUserData()
      Returns the custom user data to be encrypted with public key.

    • getEncryptionMode

      public EncryptionMode getEncryptionMode()
      Returns the mode to use for encryption.
